>
[Sanguine Klar](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1859)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 22 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Klar](/Shields.aspx?ID=12)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [wounding](/Equipment.aspx?ID=309) [klar](/Shields.aspx?ID=12)_ (Hardness 8, HP 64, BT 32) is built with spikes made of beasts' fangs.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per round; **Trigger** You or a creature within 5 feet of you suffers [bleed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) damage;  **Effect** The _sanguine klar_ regains a number of Hit Points equal to the bleed damage, up to an amount equal to its Hardness.

---

A _greater sanguine klar_ (Hardness 13, HP 100, and BT 50) is a _+2 greater striking wounding klar_, and its activation can be triggered by bleed damage at a range of 30 feet.
